text: Przygórze () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Nowa Ruda, within Kłodzko County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. Prior to 1945 it was in Germany. It lies approximately north-east of Nowa Ruda, north of Kłodzko, and south-west of the regional capital Wrocław. The village has a population of 860. ==References== Category:Villages in Kłodzko County
title: Przygórze
